Simplified manual. Start here!

Source: R/docs.R
tldr.Rd

You don't need to read long manual pages for a simple task. This manual page collects the most common pak use cases.

Package installation

Install a package from CRAN or Bioconductor

pak::pkg_install("tibble")

Install a package from GitHub

pak::pkg_install("tidyverse/tibble")

See output 
#>                                                                                                     
#> → Will update 1 package.                                                                            
#> → The package (0 B) is cached.                                                                      
#> + tibble 3.1.8 → 3.1.8.9000 👷🏿‍♂️🔧 (GitHub: c538304)                                             
#> ℹ No downloads are needed, 1 pkg is cached                                                          
#> ℹ Packaging tibble 3.1.8.9000                                                                       
#> ✔ Packaged tibble 3.1.8.9000 (1.1s)                                                                 
#> ℹ Building tibble 3.1.8.9000                                                                        
#> ✔ Built tibble 3.1.8.9000 (2.9s)                                                                    
#> ✔ Installed tibble 3.1.8.9000 (github::tidyverse/tibble@c538304) (20ms)                             
#> ✔ 1 pkg + 10 deps: kept 10, upd 1 [6.4s]

Install a package from a URL

pak::pkg_install("url::https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/tibble/tibble_3.1.7.tar.gz")

See output 
#>                                                                                                     
#> → Will install 1 package.                                                                           
#> → Will update 1 package.                                                                            
#> → All 2 packages (38.65 kB) are cached.                                                             
#> + ellipsis              0.3.2                                                                       
#> + tibble   3.1.8.9000 → 3.1.7 👷🏿‍♂️🔧                                                             
#> ℹ No downloads are needed, 2 pkgs (38.65 kB) are cached                                             
#> ✔ Installed ellipsis 0.3.2  (36ms)                                                                  
#> ℹ Building tibble 3.1.7                                                                             
#> ✔ Built tibble 3.1.7 (2.4s)                                                                         
#> ✔ Installed tibble 3.1.7  (24ms)                                                                    
#> ✔ 1 pkg + 11 deps: kept 10, upd 1, added 1 [3.5s]

Package updates

Update a package

pak::pkg_install("tibble")

See output 
#>                                                                                                     
#> → Will update 1 package.                                                                            
#> → The package (724.32 kB) is cached.                                                                
#> + tibble 3.1.7 → 3.1.8                                                                              
#> ℹ No downloads are needed, 1 pkg (724.32 kB) is cached                                              
#> ✔ Installed tibble 3.1.8  (72ms)                                                                    
#> ✔ 1 pkg + 10 deps: kept 10, upd 1 [600ms]

Update all dependencies of a package

pak::pkg_install("tibble", upgrade = TRUE)

See output 
#>                                                                                                     
#> ℹ No downloads are needed                                                                           
#> ✔ 1 pkg + 10 deps: kept 11 [505ms]

Dependency lookup

Dependencies of a CRAN or Bioconductor package

pak::pkg_deps("tibble")

See output 
#> # A data frame: 11 × 32                                                                             
#>    ref       type  direct direc…¹ status package version license needs…² prior…³                    
#>    <chr>     <chr> <lgl>  <lgl>   <chr>  <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <lgl>   <chr>                      
#>  1 cli       stan… FALSE  FALSE   OK     cli     3.3.0   MIT + … FALSE   NA                         
#>  2 fansi     stan… FALSE  FALSE   OK     fansi   1.0.3   GPL-2 … FALSE   NA                         
#>  3 glue      stan… FALSE  FALSE   OK     glue    1.6.2   MIT + … FALSE   NA                         
#>  4 lifecycle stan… FALSE  FALSE   OK     lifecy… 1.0.1   MIT + … FALSE   NA                         
#>  5 magrittr  stan… FALSE  FALSE   OK     magrit… 2.0.3   MIT + … FALSE   NA                         
#>  6 pillar    stan… FALSE  FALSE   OK     pillar  1.8.0   MIT + … FALSE   NA                         
#>  7 pkgconfig stan… FALSE  FALSE   OK     pkgcon… 2.0.3   MIT + … FALSE   NA                         
#>  8 rlang     stan… FALSE  FALSE   OK     rlang   1.0.4   MIT + … FALSE   NA                         
#>  9 tibble    stan… TRUE   TRUE    OK     tibble  3.1.8   MIT + … FALSE   NA                         
#> 10 utf8      stan… FALSE  FALSE   OK     utf8    1.2.2   Apache… FALSE   NA                         
#> 11 vctrs     stan… FALSE  FALSE   OK     vctrs   0.4.1   MIT + … FALSE   NA                         
#> # … with 22 more variables: md5sum <chr>, sha256 <chr>, filesize <int>,                             
#> #   built <chr>, platform <chr>, rversion <chr>, repotype <chr>, repodir <chr>,                     
#> #   target <chr>, deps <list>, mirror <chr>, sources <list>, remote <list>,                         
#> #   error <list>, metadata <list>, dep_types <list>, params <list>,                                 
#> #   sysreqs <chr>, cache_status <chr>, lib_status <chr>, old_version <chr>,                         
#> #   new_version <chr>, and abbreviated variable names ¹​directpkg,                                  
#> #   ²​needscompilation, ³​priority                                                                  
#> # ℹ Use `colnames()` to see all variable names

Depenendency tree of a CRAN / Bioconductor package

pak::pkg_deps_tree("tibble")

See output 
#> tibble 3.1.8 ✨                                                                                      
#> ├─fansi 1.0.3 ✨                                                                                     
#> ├─lifecycle 1.0.1 ✨                                                                                 
#> │ ├─glue 1.6.2 ✨                                                                                    
#> │ └─rlang 1.0.4 ✨                                                                                   
#> ├─magrittr 2.0.3 ✨                                                                                  
#> ├─pillar 1.8.0 ✨                                                                                    
#> │ ├─cli 3.3.0 ✨                                                                                     
#> │ │ └─glue                                                                                          
#> │ ├─fansi                                                                                           
#> │ ├─glue                                                                                            
#> │ ├─lifecycle                                                                                       
#> │ ├─rlang                                                                                           
#> │ ├─utf8 1.2.2 ✨                                                                                    
#> │ └─vctrs 0.4.1 ✨                                                                                   
#> │   ├─cli                                                                                           
#> │   ├─glue                                                                                          
#> │   └─rlang                                                                                         
#> ├─pkgconfig 2.0.3 ✨                                                                                 
#> ├─rlang                                                                                             
#> └─vctrs                                                                                             
#>                                                                                                     
#> Key:  ✨ new

Dependency trre of a package on GitHub

pak::pkg_deps_tree("tidyverse/tibble")

See output 
#> tidyverse/tibble 3.1.8.9000 ✨👷🏽‍♂️🔧                                                              
#> ├─fansi 1.0.3 ✨                                                                                     
#> ├─lifecycle 1.0.1 ✨                                                                                 
#> │ ├─glue 1.6.2 ✨                                                                                    
#> │ └─rlang 1.0.4 ✨                                                                                   
#> ├─magrittr 2.0.3 ✨                                                                                  
#> ├─pillar 1.8.0 ✨                                                                                    
#> │ ├─cli 3.3.0 ✨                                                                                     
#> │ │ └─glue                                                                                          
#> │ ├─fansi                                                                                           
#> │ ├─glue                                                                                            
#> │ ├─lifecycle                                                                                       
#> │ ├─rlang                                                                                           
#> │ ├─utf8 1.2.2 ✨                                                                                    
#> │ └─vctrs 0.4.1 ✨                                                                                   
#> │   ├─cli                                                                                           
#> │   ├─glue                                                                                          
#> │   └─rlang                                                                                         
#> ├─pkgconfig 2.0.3 ✨                                                                                 
#> ├─rlang                                                                                             
#> └─vctrs                                                                                             
#>                                                                                                     
#> Key:  ✨ new | 👷🏽‍♂️ build | 🔧 compile

Dependency tree of the package in the current directory

pak::local_deps_tree("tibble")

See output 
#> local::tibble 3.1.8 ✨👷🏻🔧                                                                         
#> ├─fansi 1.0.3 ✨                                                                                     
#> ├─lifecycle 1.0.1 ✨                                                                                 
#> │ ├─glue 1.6.2 ✨                                                                                    
#> │ └─rlang 1.0.4 ✨                                                                                   
#> ├─magrittr 2.0.3 ✨                                                                                  
#> ├─pillar 1.8.0 ✨                                                                                    
#> │ ├─cli 3.3.0 ✨                                                                                     
#> │ │ └─glue                                                                                          
#> │ ├─fansi                                                                                           
#> │ ├─glue                                                                                            
#> │ ├─lifecycle                                                                                       
#> │ ├─rlang                                                                                           
#> │ ├─utf8 1.2.2 ✨                                                                                    
#> │ └─vctrs 0.4.1 ✨                                                                                   
#> │   ├─cli                                                                                           
#> │   ├─glue                                                                                          
#> │   └─rlang                                                                                         
#> ├─pkgconfig 2.0.3 ✨                                                                                 
#> ├─rlang                                                                                             
#> └─vctrs                                                                                             
#>                                                                                                     
#> Key:  ✨ new | 👷🏻 build | 🔧 compile

(Assuming package is in directory tibble.)

Explain a recursive dependency

pak::pkg_deps_explain("tibble", "rlang")

See output 
#> tibble -> lifecycle -> rlang                                                                        
#> tibble -> pillar -> lifecycle -> rlang                                                              
#> tibble -> pillar -> rlang                                                                           
#> tibble -> pillar -> vctrs -> rlang                                                                  
#> tibble -> rlang                                                                                     
#> tibble -> vctrs -> rlang

Package development

Install dependencies of local package

pak::local_install_deps()

See output 
#> ✔ Loading metadata database ... done                                                                
#>                                                                                                     
#> → The package (0 B) is cached.                                                                      
#> ℹ No downloads are needed                                                                           
#> ✔ 10 deps: kept 10 [3s]

Install local package

pak::local_install()

See output 
#>                                                                                                     
#> → Will update 1 package.                                                                            
#> → The package (0 B) is cached.                                                                      
#> + tibble 3.1.8 → 3.1.8 👷🏻‍♀️🔧                                                                    
#> ℹ No downloads are needed, 1 pkg is cached                                                          
#> ✔ Got tibble 3.1.8 (source) (96 B)                                                                  
#> ℹ Packaging tibble 3.1.8                                                                            
#> ✔ Packaged tibble 3.1.8 (664ms)                                                                     
#> ℹ Building tibble 3.1.8                                                                             
#> ✔ Built tibble 3.1.8 (2s)                                                                           
#> ✔ Installed tibble 3.1.8 (local) (27ms)                                                             
#> ✔ 1 pkg + 10 deps: kept 10, upd 1, dld 1 (NA B) [3.6s]

Install all dependencies of local package

pak::local_install_dev_deps()

Repositories

List current repositories

pak::repo_get()

See output 
#> # A data frame: 5 × 5                                                                               
#>   name          url                                        type  r_ver…¹ bioc_…²                    
#> * <chr>         <chr>                                      <chr> <chr>   <chr>                      
#> 1 CRAN          https://cloud.r-project.org                cran  *       NA                         
#> 2 BioCsoft      https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/bi… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> 3 BioCann       https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/da… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> 4 BioCexp       https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/da… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> 5 BioCworkflows https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/wo… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> # … with abbreviated variable names ¹​r_version, ²​bioc_version

Add custom repository

pak::repo_add(rhub = 'https://r-hub.r-universe.dev')
pak::repo_get()

See output 
#> # A data frame: 6 × 5                                                                               
#>   name          url                                        type  r_ver…¹ bioc_…²                    
#> * <chr>         <chr>                                      <chr> <chr>   <chr>                      
#> 1 CRAN          https://cloud.r-project.org                cran  *       NA                         
#> 2 rhub          https://r-hub.r-universe.dev               cran… *       NA                         
#> 3 BioCsoft      https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/bi… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> 4 BioCann       https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/da… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> 5 BioCexp       https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/da… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> 6 BioCworkflows https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/wo… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> # … with abbreviated variable names ¹​r_version, ²​bioc_version

Remove custom repositories

options(repos = getOption("repos")["CRAN"])
pak::repo_get()

See output 
#> # A data frame: 5 × 5                                                                               
#>   name          url                                        type  r_ver…¹ bioc_…²                    
#> * <chr>         <chr>                                      <chr> <chr>   <chr>                      
#> 1 CRAN          https://cloud.r-project.org                cran  *       NA                         
#> 2 BioCsoft      https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/bi… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> 3 BioCann       https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/da… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> 4 BioCexp       https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/da… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> 5 BioCworkflows https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.15/wo… bioc  4.2.1   3.15                       
#> # … with abbreviated variable names ¹​r_version, ²​bioc_version

Keeps only CRAN and (by default) Bioconductor.

Time travel using RSPM

pak::repo_add(CRAN = "RSPM@2022-06-30")
pak::repo_get()

Libraries

List packages in a library

pak::lib_status(Sys.getenv("R_LIBS_USER"))
